links.title: Why the 'Dark Clouds' Over Apple's Stock Might Stay Awhile, Despite Trade Truce
links.description: Investors are pretty down on Apple ( AAPL) these days. Apple's stock has sagged almost 24% since hitting a high on Oct. 3, after an otherwise high-flying year for Apple investors that temporarily pushed its valuation past the $1 trillion mark this summer.
